title: native XSLT 2 support
body: SVG, Atom, X3DOM, ePub3, polyglot XHTML5, .. all formats serving varied purposes can be obtained without learning multiple dialects like Elm, CoffeeScript, iojs.. With the growing preference for native mobile apps over web browsing, XSLT producing all of above is crucial. Irrespective of browser wars, now is the time for bringing first class support back to XML family. This will be useful for developers using webviewer XAML control (for example, in an ePub authoring app) also.

comments.body: Saxon CE uses GWT, that uses HTML DOM, not content-type: xhtml's xml DOM.
